definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: Her pains are mostly pure imagination.
sentences.chinese: 她的疼痛多半是純粹想像出來的東西。

sentences.english: Which hides your life, and shows not half your parts.
sentences.chinese: 將你的生命和美質多半掩藏。

sentences.english: It is usually eaten with soy-bean sauce or orange sauce.
sentences.chinese: 在喫時多半沾醬油加蔥或桔醬。

sentences.english: Pollen mother cell division showed massive failure and bare fertility occurred.
sentences.chinese: 花粉母細胞分裂多半異常且無生殖結子能力。

sentences.english: Scorpions live mostly in the desert , but can handle all kinds of weather.
sentences.chinese: 蠍子多半住在沙漠中，卻可適應各種天候。

sentences.english: Probably she was the woman playing sword in front of the jade!
sentences.chinese: 嗯，多半便是那個在石壁前使劍的女子。

sentences.english: Much of China’s epic stimulus was channelled through its banks.
sentences.chinese: 中國宏大的經濟刺激計劃多半以銀行爲渠道。

sentences.english: That most things which take place in your thoughts never eventuate.
sentences.chinese: 曾經擔心過的事情，多半不會發生。

sentences.english: Over half never even made it to the adoption center.
sentences.chinese: 一多半甚至不用去領養中心。

sentences.english: Diamonds from Liberia are mostly conflict-free.
sentences.chinese: 來自賴比瑞亞的鑽石多半是無衝突的。

sentences.english: Torts may be classified according to the gravity of the fault of the wrongdoer.
sentences.chinese: 侵權行爲多半根據做壞事者過錯的嚴重性來分類。

sentences.english: Most women prefer husbands with big hearts.
sentences.chinese: 多半女人喜歡心地善良令人窩心的老公。

sentences.english: I have a persistent cough. I cough up a lot of phlegm(thick spit)on most days.
sentences.chinese: 我不停地在咳，多半時間咳出濃濃的痰。

sentences.english: In the meantime, half the movie has gone by, and you've missed it.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，電影已經放映了一多半，而你全錯過了。

sentences.english: He coughs up a lot of phlegm (thick spit) on most days.
sentences.chinese: 他多半時間咳出濃濃的痰。

sentences.english: He told us that the puppy would die mainly because it could not suckle.
sentences.chinese: 他告訴我們，這隻小狗多半會死去，因爲它無法吸奶。

definition: most likely/mostly (in 8 or 9 cases out of 10)/vast majority
for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
Dadu, capital of China during the Yuan Dynasty (1280-1368), modern day Beijing
for the most part/on the whole/also pr. [da4 du1]
for the most part/on the whole/metropolitan
generally speaking/by and large/for the most part
to be bound to/to be sure to
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
